description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean Lamb Shanks With Polenta Mash & Broccolini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mediterranean Lamb Shanks With Polenta Mash & Broccolini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove lamb shanks and sauce from packet and place into an ovenproof dish. Cover with foil and heat for 30 minutes.
Place tomatoes onto a baking tray. Drizzle with a little oil, then season with salt and pepper. Place into oven alongside the shanks and continue to cook both for a further 15 minutes.

Meanwhile, bring 3 cups water to the boil in a medium pan. Slowly add polenta in a steady stream, stirring constantly. Cook for 5 minutes or until polenta thickens. Remove from heat and stir in butter and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper.
Spoon polenta mash onto plates, top with lamb shanks and spoon over sauce. Serve with roast tomatoes and broccolini.
